titles.title: A resolution authorizing expenditures by the Joint Committee on the Organization of Congress.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S.RES. 71 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 1/28/1993--Introduced. Authorizes expenditures by the Joint Committee on the Organization of Congress for the 103d Congress.
